channel.title: 508 Problem
channel.description:
Either once I run the source it says something about the Main java. It says...
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.No.ClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue...[/code]
[b]THIS IS A 508 PROBLEM.[/b]
EDIT:
This is my Run.bat [code]@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause[/code]
This is my Compiler [code]@echo off Title Pker-Time Compiler cd .. "d:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: 508 Problem

item.description:

item.title: 508 Problem
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:15, topic:283479”]I figured it out, it was…

@echo off cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause exit

Thanks dude.[/quote]

np dude…i knew it would be whatever was in c/program files/ java…just didnt know what u had there but its good that u figured it out

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Problem
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I figured it out, it was…

@echo off cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause exit

Thanks dude.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Problem
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

try this

@echo off cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause exit

or

@echo off cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause exit

its definitly one or the other

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Problem
item.dc:creator: @bite_the_man bite the man
item.description:
@bite_the_man wrote:

delete everything in ur run.bat and paste this into it

@echo off cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 pause exit

then run ur server…it should work after that

Read full topic
